tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cultural_heritage_sites (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    date_established DATE,
    historical_significance TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE monuments (
  monument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  monument_name VARCHAR(100),
  monument_type VARCHAR(50),
  year_built INT,
  monument_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE heritage_sites (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date_established DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE monuments (
    monument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    monument_name VARCHAR(255),
    site_id INT,
    architect VARCHAR(255),
    year_built INT
);

CREATE TABLE cultural_heritage_sites (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE monuments (
    monument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    monument_name VARCHAR(100),
    site_id INT,
    year_built INT,
    architect VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE countries (
    country_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country_name VARCHAR(100),
    continent VARCHAR(100),
    population INT
)

CREATE TABLE categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cultural_heritage_sites (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    image_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE monuments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    monument_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    year_built INT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_events (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100),
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cultural_artifacts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artifact_name VARCHAR(100),
    origin VARCHAR(100),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cultural_organizations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    org_name VARCHAR(100),
    headquarters VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)
